name: rockfall-prediction-system
description: AI-Based Rockfall Prediction and Alert System for Open-Pit Mines

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: cd backend && python -m pytest tests/ && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && flake8 . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
